Accessing the Online Manuals

The online manuals were created using Adobe's Portable Document Format (PDF). To view PDF files, use Adobe® Reader®, which is freely available from www.adobe.com.

If both the manuals and Adobe Acrobat Reader are installed on your system, you can access the online manuals by selecting Help | Online Manuals.

NOTE: UNIX users must configure Version Manager with the location of Adobe Reader; select View | Options | Applications tab and enter the location of the Acrobat executable in the Adobe Acrobat Reader Location field.
